items.typeLine: Chemist's Silver Flask of the Impala
enchantMods: Reused at the end of this Flask's effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Allure
implicitMods: 2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
explicitMods: You gain Phasing for 10 seconds on using a Vaal Skill
flavourText: What drives us to kill, to carve and to shred?
What drives us to drink the seething souls of the dead?
What drives us to love and to hold, but still go amiss?
What drives us to leave this world for the Abyss?

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that deals damage or has a duration.
explicitMods: Supported Skills deal 24% more Damage over Time
Supported Skills have 24% increased Skill Effect Duration
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill with a duration.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 74% increased Skill Effect Duration
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Gain a buff that makes you faster, harder to detect, and grants Phasing, letting you pass through enemies. Performing any skill replaces this buff with one that boosts melee physical damage of skills you use yourself (it will not apply to your melee skills used by totems). Consumes Frenzy Charges to increase duration.
explicitMods: 100% increased Skill Duration per Frenzy Charge removed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Viridi's Veil
implicitMods: Socketed Skill Gems get a 90% Cost & Reservation Multiplier
explicitMods: Damage of Enemies Hitting you is Unlucky while you have a Magic Ring Equipped
You are Hexproof if you have a Magic Ring in right slot
Take no Extra Damage from Critical Strikes if you have a Magic Ring in left slot
flavourText: "Her sisters eternally fought for that shining apex in the skies,
but Viridi instead found strength in humility."
- Azmerian Creation Myth

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that increases the movement speed, attack speed and cast speed of you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 16% increased Movement Speed
You and nearby allies gain 25% increased Cast Speed
You and nearby allies gain 25% increased Attack Speed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will apply a cost & reservation multiplier to supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants evasion to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 2700 additional Evasion Rating
You and nearby allies gain 30% more Evasion rating
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants armour to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 2153 additional Armour
You and nearby allies gain 50% more Armour
You and nearby Allies gain 2% of Evasion Rating as Extra Armour
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: The Poet's Pen
explicitMods: +1 to Level of Socketed Skill Gems per 25 Player Levels
Trigger a Socketed Spell when you Attack with this Weapon, with a 0.25 second Cooldown
Adds 3 to 5 Physical Damage to Attacks with this Weapon per 3 Player Levels
flavourText: In every piece of prose, lies a tiny spark of magic.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Fires a projectile that will pierce through enemies to impact the ground at the targeted location, creating a Bone Archer corpse where it lands.
explicitMods: Corpses Spawned have 20% increased Maximum Life
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will raise the level of supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
explicitMods: +3 to Level of Supported Skill Gems
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports skills that fire projectiles from the user. Does not affect projectiles fired from other locations as secondary effects.
explicitMods: Supported Skills also fire Projectiles from up to 4 points on each side of you
Supported Skills deal 30% less Projectile Damage
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Queen of the Forest
implicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed AoE Gems
+2 to Level of Socketed Curse Gems
explicitMods: 1% increased Movement Speed per 600 Evasion Rating, up to 75%
-50 Physical Damage taken from Hits by Animals
flavourText: Shedding away her regal past,
she forged a new destiny.
Sacrificing the ephemeral joys of man,
she embraced the eternal grasp of nature.
Seizing her one true wish,
she found peace at last.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Performs an attack that gives the character a frenzy charge if it hits. Frenzy charges increase your attack speed.
explicitMods: 5% more Attack Damage per Frenzy Charge
5% more Attack Speed per Frenzy Charge
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, lowering their elemental resistances.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies have -30% to Elemental Resistances
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

properties.name: Spell, AoE, Duration, Fire, Curse, Hex

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, lowering their fire resistance and giving them a chance to be ignited when hit.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies have -36% to Fire Resistance
Hits against Cursed Enemies have +25% chance to Ignite
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that hits enemies. If enemies are left below 10% of maximum life after being hit by these skills, they will be killed.
explicitMods: Kill Enemies that have 10% Life or lower when Hit by Supported Skills
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, reducing their accuracy and making them deal less damage.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies have 20% reduced Accuracy Rating
Cursed Normal or Magic enemies deal 30% less Damage
Cursed Rare or Unique enemies deal 19% less Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Must support both a skill that hits enemies, and a hex curse skill to work. The hex will be applied when enemies are hit by the other skill. Cannot support totems, traps, or mines. Minions cannot apply hexes this way.
explicitMods: Supported Skills apply supported Curses on Hit
You cannot Cast Supported Curse Spells
Supported Skills have 15% reduced Curse Duration
Hexes applied by Supported Curse Skills have 20% chance to affect Hexproof Enemies
+1 to Level of Supported Curse Skill Gems
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Kaom's Spirit
enchantMods: Trigger Commandment of Flames on Hit
explicitMods: 0.37% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Life Recovery from Regeneration is not applied
Regenerate 1 Rage per second for every 100 Life Recovery per second from Regeneration
flavourText: Who can tell when whispers are truly from a god?

socketedItems.secDescrText: Conjures an icy barrier that chills enemies when they hit you. You drop chilled ground while moving, and take less Fire and Physical damage while stationary.
explicitMods: Buff grants 22% less Physical Damage taken from Hits while stationary
Buff grants 21% less Fire Damage taken from Hits while stationary
Chill Enemy for 0.5 seconds when Hit, reducing their Action Speed by 30%
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

properties.name: Spell, AoE, Duration, Fire, Physical, Guard

socketedItems.secDescrText: Applies a buff that adds to your armour, and can take some of the damage from hits for you before being depleted. When the buff expires or is depleted, the skill deals reflected damage to enemies around you based on the total damage that was taken from the buff. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.
explicitMods: This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect

75% of Damage from Hits is taken from the Buff before your Life or Energy Shield
Buff can take Damage equal to 15% of your Armour, up to a maximum of 5000
Reflects 3000% of Damage taken from Buff as Fire Damage when Buff expires or is depleted
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Consumes Rage at an accelerating rate to provide a powerful buff, granting more attack damage, attack speed, movement speed, and less damage taken.
explicitMods: At least 5 Rage required to start Berserking
Each second, 20% more Rage loss Rate
This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

the type Delta test subject actually survived the entire testing regimen."

socketedItems.secDescrText: Targets a corpse, and deals spell damage to enemies around the corpse, as well as causing the corpse to explode, dealing fire damage. The explosion is not affected by modifiers to spell damage and cannot be reflected.
explicitMods: Explosion deals base Fire Damage equal to 8% of the corpse's Maximum Life

items.name: Perepiteia
explicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed Lightning Gems

flavourText: Something within the machine never stops moving,
but Oriathan scholars dare not open it to find out why.

properties.name: Movement, AoE, Channelling, Attack, Lightning, Melee

socketedItems.secDescrText: Channel to project an illusion which you steer. You gain stages while it moves, until it stops at a maximum total distance. Waves of area damage frequently pulse along its path, based on your attack speed. Stop channelling to teleport to the illusion, dealing a final wave of damage. Requires a Melee Weapon.
explicitMods: 50% of Physical Damage Converted to Lightning Damage
Deals 150% more Damage while Channelling if Illusion has finished moving
Hits from Final wave deal 75% of Damage per stage
Illusion moves at 130% of your Movement Speed

Hits against Cursed Enemies have +1.5% to Critical Strike Chance
Hits against Cursed Enemies have +49% to Critical Strike Multiplier
Cursed enemies grant 600 Life when Killed
Cursed enemies grant 80 Mana when Killed

socketedItems.secDescrText: Places a Sigil on the ground, which grants a buff to you and allies in the area around it for a duration. The Sigil gains stages as you spend mana in its area, making the buff more powerful. You can only have one Sigil of Power at a time.
explicitMods: Gains a Stage when you Spend a total of 337 Mana while in Area
Enemies in Area deal 18% less Damage while at maximum Stages
Buff grants 6 to 120 Added Lightning Damage per Stage

items.name: Anathema
explicitMods: 11% chance to gain a Power Charge when you Cast a Curse Spell
Your Curse Limit is equal to your maximum Power Charges
flavourText: Enraged by the incompetence of mortals
The demon-lord opens a gateway
Unleashing a litany of pain upon the world.

items.name: Immortal Flesh
enchantMods: +300 to Evasion Rating while you have Phasing
implicitMods: +24% to Critical Strike Multiplier during any Flask Effect
explicitMods: -46 Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits
40% increased Armour while not Ignited, Frozen or Shocked
flavourText: "She begged the Earth to spare her Son;
Out of love the Earth agreed.
To the other Elements she did not speak
And out of spite They plotted."
- Berek and the Untamed
